statements.select: select * from zxt_base.aorg where orgid like #orgid# order by orgid

select count(*) as total from aorg
orgid like '$ORGID$%'
orgname like '%$ORGNAME$%'

select a.*,b.orgname as parentname from (select * from (select ROWNUM RN,T.* from ( select * from aorg
orgid like '$ORGID$%'
orgname like '%$ORGNAME$%'
order by orgid desc ) T where ROWNUM<=#PageEnd#) where RN>#PageStart#) a left join aorg b on a.parentid=b.orgid
statements.insert: insert into aorg (orgid, orgname, parentid, remark) values ((select #PARENTID#||lpad(substr(max(orgid),length(#PARENTID#)+1)+1,3,'0') from aorg where parentid=#PARENTID#), #ORGNAME#, #PARENTID#, #REMARK#)
statements.update: update aorg set orgname=#ORGNAME#, remark=#REMARK# where orgid=#ORGID#
